review_data.title: Schöner Platz zum Verweilen
review_data.content: Das Bierwerk Züri bietet eine große Auswahl an frischen Bieren da findet jeder etwas für seinen Geschmack. Außerdem gibt es...More

review_data.title: Nice staff, convenient location
review_data.content: Great to follow along with the progress of the place on their well-updated social media sites. A lot of hard work and effort has been put into this brewery located at the side of the main Zurich train station. Some seating inside and lots of...More
